action: I want to submit applications such as expenses and contracts through a formal approval flow and visualize the status
reason: Because I need to maintain internal controls, ensure process compliance, and prevent fraud or approval omissions
acceptance_criteria: The system shall allow only authenticated users with specific role-based permissions to create applications.
The system must automatically generate a globally unique Application ID for each new record.
The system shall require the selection of an Application Type (e.g., Expense, Contract) and a Title for every submission.
The system must validate that the application content does not exceed 1000 characters.
The system shall validate that amount fields contain only numeric values for financial applications.
The system must allow file attachments while strictly enforcing a configurable file size limit and an extension allowlist.
The system shall execute a virus scan on all uploaded files and reject any file that poses a security threat.
The system must sanitize all input data to prevent Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attacks.
The system shall use parameterized queries for all database interactions to prevent SQL injection.
The system must automatically generate the approval workflow route based on administrator-defined configurations.
The system shall automatically route the application to a designated proxy approver if the primary approver is absent.
The system must support distinct workflow states including 'Approved', 'Returned', and 'Rejected'.
The system shall restrict approval actions exclusively to users with the appropriate approval authority.
The system must require mandatory comments when an application is 'Returned' or 'Rejected'.
The system shall implement optimistic locking to detect and prevent concurrent approval conflicts.
The system must publish notification events to an asynchronous queue when an application is returned or fully completed.
The system shall maintain a complete history of changes, recording both pre-modification and post-modification values.
The system must support logical deletion of applications, restricted to 'Administrator' users only.
The system shall strictly prohibit the deletion of applications that have already been approved.
The system must generate an immutable audit log for every operation, capturing Application ID, User ID, Action, and Timestamp.
The system shall store audit logs in tamper-evident storage to prevent modification.
The system must enforce HTTPS (TLS 1.2+) and rate limiting for all API operations.
The approval API must adhere to REST architectural principles and support versioning.
The system shall target an API response time of under 500ms for approval operations.
